content: I'm interested in trying out Headspace and Insight Timer. I've heard great things about both apps, and I like that they offer a variety of guided meditations and tracking features. I'm also curious about exploring the free resources you mentioned, like UCLA Mindful Awareness Research Center and Tara Brach's website. Since I'm just starting out with meditation, I think it's helpful to have a mix of guided sessions and flexibility to explore different styles and topics.
